scenario.name: Basic MESSAGE send and receive
scenario.send:
MESSAGE sip:test@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK-24096-1-0 From: user <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=1 To: <sip:test@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: 1234567890 CSeq: 1 MESSAGE Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 3600 Content-Type: text/plain Content-Length: 18
